items.sentence: This is my last chance to do this before I go to Boston.
Tom and Mary have been inseparable for over three years.
Tom won\'t be coming tonight, but I\'m not sure why yet.
If you want Tom\'s help, you\'ll have to ask him for it.
Tom knew that the gun Mary had in her hand wasn\'t real.
I\'m sure that Tom didn\'t intend to hurt your feelings.
Tom doesn\'t want me to go, but I\'m going to go anyway.
Tom is likely to tell you some things that aren\'t true.
I told Tom that I didn\'t want to go to Boston with him.
This is the suit that I\'m going to wear to the concert.
Tom currently doesn\'t make as much money as he used to.
I can\'t start up my computer. What am I supposed to do?
I can\'t swallow these tablets without a drink of water.
I can\'t turn the shower off. Could you check it for me?
I\'m talking to a friend. I\'ll get back to you shortly.
Dad gave me a book, and my little brother gave me a pen.
You can\'t keep Tom from wishing he could go to college.
You can\'t let Tom get away with telling lies about you.
Tom pretended to be angry even though he really wasn\'t.
The hotel I stayed in was not too far from Tom\'s house.
